parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "displayName": "Reklamationen-2025",
  "description": "Archiv Reklamationen Geschaeftsjahr 2025",
  "columns": [
    { "name": "QA_ID", "text": { "allowMultipleLines": false } },
    { "name": "Rekla_Typ", "choice": { "choices": ["Kunde", "Lieferant"] } },
    { "name": "Absender", "text": { "allowMultipleLines": false } },
    { "name": "Artikel_Nr", "text": { "allowMultipleLines": false } },
    { "name": "Erfassungsdatum", "dateTime": { "format": "dateOnly" } },
    { "name": "Formular", "text": { "allowMultipleLines": false } },
    { "name": "Status", "choice": { "choices": ["Abgeschlossen", "Offen"] } },
    { "name": "Fehler_Beschreibung", "text": { "allowMultipleLines": true } },
    { "name": "Dateien", "text": { "allowMultipleLines": true } },
    { "name": "Team", "text": { "allowMultipleLines": false } },
    { "name": "Verursacher", "text": { "allowMultipleLines": false } },
    { "name": "Kostenstelle", "text": { "allowMultipleLines": false } },
    { "name": "NZA_Kosten", "number": { "decimalPlaces": "two" } },
    { "name": "Q_Nr_Kunde", "text": { "allowMultipleLines": false } }
  ],
  "list": {
    "template": "genericList"
  }
}
